thread.title: broken object after adding "codes"?

comments.text: i was making my scripts for my 3d manouvering gear but after adding an emitting script it just broke and when i go to save it it turns into what ill hopefully be able to post!
this was happening to some others too and its breaking creations
it might look fine or like its not there but it is there and its not fine! try pulling it out and putting it in your inventory!
i am getting this bug too, it seems like it happens when you try to make cylinders move.

thread.latestCommentText: i am getting this bug too, it seems like it happens when you try to make cylinders move.
